skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.

Deals damage from all [Poison] debuffs on the target instantly. [Poison] debuffs will only deal half of the standard damage when this Skill hits Bosses.
skills.name: Deadly Catalyst

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Applies a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 4 random debuffs from the target and placing them on all enemies.

[Only available when Belanor is on the same team.]
skills.name: Calamitous Partner
